sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthsyshist ( HIST_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , HIST_SE_CODE /* */ , HIST_CN /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #histId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #histSeCode# /* */ , #histCn# /* */ , #sysNm# /* */ , #atchFileId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthsyshist SET HIST_ID=#histId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , HIST_SE_CODE=#histSeCode# /* */ , HIST_CN=#histCn# /* */ , SYS_NM=#sysNm# /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId# /* */ WHERE HIST_ID=#histId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT HIST_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , HIST_SE_CODE /* */ , HIST_CN /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ FROM comthsyshist WHERE HIST_ID=#histId# /* */

SELECT HIST_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , HIST_SE_CODE /* */ , HIST_CN /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ FROM comthsyshist WHERE 1=1
HIST_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FRST_REGIST_PNTTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY HIST_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comthsyshist WHERE 1=1
HIST_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FRST_REGIST_PNTTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
